snippet: By awarding the Nobel Peace Prize to the European Union, the Norwegians chose to send a political message rather than to single out great achievements.
abstract: Editorial contends Norwegian Nobel Committee's decision to award its peace prize to the European Union is yet another example of the organization using its prestige to send a political message.
lead_paragraph: By awarding the Nobel Peace Prize to the European Union, the Norwegians chose to send a political message rather than to single out great achievements.
